steps.intention: Identify blockers and proceed with grounded information.
steps.note: The blocker is identifying the next object in the sequence. Use visual pattern recognition.

steps.intention: Determine the next object in the sequence based on the pattern.
steps.note: Analyze the sequence of objects in the image to identify the pattern.

steps.intention: Map the determined object to one of the provided options.
steps.note: Select the correct option based on the identified pattern.

steps.intention: Output the exact content of the correct choice.
